name: WhatsApp UI (iOS)
description:
WhatsApp UI for iOS


Excited to share the latest WhatsApp UI (iOS) for the community!


I'm currently working in a SaaS company focusing on the conversational platform which is also an official WhatsApp Business Solution Provider. The demand on creating WhatsApp user interface for the marketing team is quite high. The ideation of creating WhatsApp UI Kit came up during this situation.


By using the magic of auto-layout and a bit hack on it really help me to focus on editing the content instead of the design.


Go duplicate for yourself! Have suggestions? Let me know! @theophilusbob on Twitter :D


Lots of ❤️,

Boby


(Some iOS UI 14 Kit authored by @joeybank)
